src: 史丹佛大學醫學院的科學家於週一宣布發明一項新型診斷工具，可依類型將細胞分類：這是一種細小的可列印芯片，使用標準噴墨印表機就能印出，每個芯片的成本大約一美分。
mt: Scientists at Stanford University School of Medicine announced on Monday that they had invented a new diagnostic tool to classify cells by type: a small, printable chip that can be printed using a standard inkjet printer and costs about one cent per chip.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.

src: 主要研究人員表示，這或許可以讓低收入國家的癌症、肺結核、愛滋病毒及瘧疾病患早期發現病症。在這些國家，乳癌等疾病患者的存活率是較富裕國家的一半。
mt: Major researchers say that this could enable cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in low-income countries to be detected early. In these countries, the survival rate of people with diseases such as breast cancer is half that of the richer countries.
ref: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: JAS 39C 獅鷲戰鬥機在當地時間上午 9 點 30 分（世界協調時間 02:30）墜落在跑道上並爆炸，導致機場暫停商業航班的起降。
mt: The JAS 39C Gripen fighter crashed on the runway at 9:30 a.m. local time (02:30 Coordinated Universal Time) and exploded, causing the airport to suspend commercial flights.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.

src: 駕駛員的身分確認是空軍少校帕塔維 (Dilokrit Pattavee)。
mt: The pilot's identity is confirmed to be Air Force Major Delokrit Pattavee.
ref: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.

src: 當地媒體報導一輛機場消防車在出勤時翻覆。
mt: Local media reported that a fire truck from an airport overturned while on duty.
ref: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: 28 歲的維達爾三個賽季前從塞維利亞足球俱樂部加入巴塞隆納足球俱樂部。
mt: Vidal, 28, joined Barcelona Football Club three seasons ago from Seville.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.

src: 自從搬到加泰隆尼亞的首府後，比達爾已經為球隊踢了 49 場球賽。
mt: Since moving to the capital of Catalonia, Bidar has played 49 games for the team.
ref: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: 抗議活動在當地時間約 11 點開始 (UTC+1)，地點在白廳街，正對著有警察駐守的唐寧街首相官邸入口。
mt: Protests began around 11 a.m. local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall Street, facing the entrance to the Prime Minister's Official Residence, which is guarded by police.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.

src: 才剛過11點，抗議者就封鎖了白廳北向車道的交通。
mt: Just after 11 o'clock, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound road of White Hall.
ref: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.

src: 警察在 11 點 20 分要求抗議者退回到人行道，並對抗議者表明他們得在抗議權和堵塞交通間取得平衡。
mt: At 11:20 p.m., police demanded that protesters return to the sidewalk and showed to the protesters that they had to strike a balance between protesting rights and blocking traffic.
ref: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.

src: 11:29 左右，示威者朝白廳移動，越過特拉法加廣場，沿著河岸街，經過奧德維奇，自金斯威往北朝霍本前進，當時保守黨正於此處的格蘭康納特飯店舉行春季座談會。
mt: At around 11:29, the protesters moved towards Whitehall, crossed ⁇  Square, and ran along Riverside Street, past Odwych, from Kingsway north towards Hopen. At that time, the Conservative Party was holding a spring symposium at the Granconate Hotel in this area.
ref: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: 納達爾與這名加拿大選手的交手紀錄為 7–2。
mt: Nadal's match record with this Canadian player is 7-2.
ref: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.

src: 他最近在布里斯本公開賽中輸給了拉奧尼奇。
mt: He recently lost to La Onich in the Brisbane Open.
ref: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.

src: 納達爾在這場比賽中拿下了 88% 的網前分，首發贏得 76 分。
mt: Nadal took 88% of the lead in this game, winning 76 points in the first start.
ref: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.

src: 紅土之王在賽後說道：「能在最重要的賽事中重返最後一輪，我感到興奮不已，我會盡力贏得比賽。」
mt: The King of the Red Earth said after the game: "I'm excited to be able to return to the last round in the most important event, and I'll do my best to win the game."
ref: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."

src: 「巴拿馬文件」統稱 2016 年春天，巴拿馬法律事務所莫薩克‧馮賽卡外洩給媒體的文件，約有一千萬份。
mt: In the spring of 2016, the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca leaked to the media with some 10 million copies.
ref: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.

src: 文件中指出 14 家銀行協助富有客戶藏匿了數十億美元的資產，以規避稅金與其他法規。
mt: The document states that 14 banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of dollars in assets to avoid taxes and other regulations.
ref: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.

src: 英國報紙《衛報》暗指，用於實現此目的的 1,200 間空殼公司裡，德意志銀行控制了大約三分之一。
mt: British newspaper The Guardian implied that among the 1,200 shell companies used to achieve this purpose, Deutsche Bank controlled about one-third.
ref: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.

src: 此事件造成世界各地的抗議活動 、多起刑事訴訟，冰島及巴基斯坦的政府領導人也雙雙辭職。
mt: The event has caused protests around the world, multiple criminal lawsuits, and both Icelandic and Pakistani government leaders have resigned.
ref: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.

src: 馬英九出生於香港，曾就讀於紐約大學和哈佛法學院，並曾持有美國永久居民的「綠卡」。
mt: Ma Ying-jeou was born in Hong Kong, attended New York University and Harvard Law School, and once held a permanent resident's "green card".
ref: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".

src: 謝長廷在選舉期間暗指馬英九可能會在危難時刻逃出國。
mt: During the election period, Xie Changting implied that Ma Ying-jeou might escape from the country at a critical moment.
ref: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.

src: 謝長廷還表明，上相的馬英九只是虛有其表。
mt: Frank Hsieh also pointed out that Ma Ying-jeou, the superior, was merely a bluff.
ref: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.

src: 儘管有這些指控，馬英九仍以提倡與中國大陸形成更緊密連結的政見輕易獲勝。
mt: Despite these allegations, Ma Ying-jeou still easily won by advocating for a more closely linked political stance with mainland China.
ref: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.

src: 獲得今日最佳球員的是華盛頓首都隊的亞歷克斯．歐維契金。
mt: The best player of the day was Alex O'Wittkin from the Washington Capitals.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.

src: 在華盛頓以五比三擊敗亞特蘭大鶇鳥的比賽中，他進了兩球並有兩次助攻。
mt: In a 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrush in Washington, he scored two goals and provided two assists.
ref: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.

src: 奧維琴根當晚第一記助攻，就獻給新人尼可拉斯‧巴克斯卓打進的那顆致勝球；
mt: Ovichengen's first assist that night was dedicated to the winning goal of the newcomer Nicholas Baxter;
ref: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;

src: 他當晚的第二次射門得分，是他在該賽季的第 60 次得分，這使他成為 1995-96 賽季以來第一位在單一賽季進 60 球以上的球員。亞羅米爾·佳格 (Jaromir Jagr) 和馬里奧·拉謬 (Mario Lemieux) 在 1995-96 賽季中分別達到這個里程碑。
mt: His second goal-scoring of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score more than 60 goals in a single season since the 1995-96 season. Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux reached this milestone in the 1995-96 season respectively.
ref: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: 巴汀以估計為 23 億美元的財產，在 2008 年美國前四百大富豪排行榜上名列第 190 位。
mt: Bartin, estimated to be worth $2.3 billion in assets, ranked 190th on the US Top 400 Richest People list in 2008.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.

src: 他在 1950 年從維吉尼亞大學藝術與科學學院畢業，並且大力資助該學院。
mt: He graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Art and Science in 1950, and heavily supported the college.
ref: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: 伊拉克的阿布格萊布監獄在一次暴亂中慘遭祝融。
mt: Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was incinerated during a riot.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.

src: 此監獄因美軍接手後爆發的虐囚事件而惡名昭彰。
mt: This prison is notorious for its brutality resulting from the US military taking over.
ref: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: 2008 年新加坡大獎賽中，小畢奇在費爾南多·阿隆索短暫停車檢修不久後，就發生撞車事故，導致安全車出動。
mt: At the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix, a car crash occurred shortly after Fernando Alonso's brief stop-and-repair, causing a safety car to be driven out.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.

src: 當阿隆索前面的汽車在安全車的引領下進站加油時，他移動到車隊的前方以取得勝利。
mt: When the car in front of Alonso enters the station to refuel under the guidance of a safety car, he moves to the front of the team to win.
ref: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.

src: 小畢奇在 2009 年匈牙利大獎賽後失去賽車手的身分。
mt: After losing his driver status at the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: 上午8點46分時，整座城市陷入一片寂靜，此刻正是第一架噴射機撞擊目標的確切時間。
mt: At 8:46 a.m., the entire city was plunged into silence, which is the exact time when the first jet plane struck the target.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.

src: 整個晚上，兩道光束直直照向天際。
mt: Throughout the night, two beams of light shine straight into the sky.
ref: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.

src: 目前正在原址興建五座新的摩天大樓，中間有一座轉運站和紀念公園。
mt: Five new skyscrapers are currently being built on the original site, with a transfer station and a memorial park in between.
ref: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: 這部美國公共電視臺 (PBS) 出品的節目獲得超過 24 座艾美獎，播出時間僅次於《芝麻街》和《羅傑斯先生的鄰居》。
mt: This American Public Television (PBS)-produced program won more than 24 Emmy Awards, ranking second only to Sesame Street and Mr. Rogers' Neighborhood in broadcast time.
ref: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.

src: 節目的每一集將專注在一本特定書籍中的某個主題上，並接著藉由多個故事來探索該主題。
mt: Each episode of the program focuses on a specific theme in a specific book, and then explores that theme through multiple stories.
ref: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.

src: 每集節目也將為孩子們去圖書館時應該找的書提供建議。
mt: Each episode will also provide suggestions for books that children should look for when going to the library.
ref: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.

src: 來自水牛城 WNED 電台（閱讀彩虹的母台）的約翰·格蘭特表示，「閱讀彩虹教導孩子們為何要閱讀，......熱愛閱讀。[該節目]鼓勵孩子們拿起書本開始閱讀。」
mt: John Grant, from Buffalo WNED Radio (the radio station where you read Rainbow), said, “Reading Rainbow teaches kids why to read, ... love to read.” The show encourages kids to pick up books and start reading.”
ref: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."

src: 包括約翰葛蘭特在內的一些人認為，財政困難及電視教育節目理念的改變，促使此系列畫下句點。
mt: Some people, including John Grant, believe that financial difficulties and changes in the concept of television education programs have led to the series' conclusion.
ref: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.

src: 氣象預報員說，這場颶風位於維德角島西方 645 英里（1040 公里）處，很有可能在威脅到陸地之前就消散掉。
mt: Weather forecasters say the hurricane is located 645 miles (1,040 km) west of Cape Verde Island and is likely to dissipate before it threatens land.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.

src: 弗雷德 (Fred) 目前風速為每小時 105 英里（165 公里／小時）並往西北方前進。
mt: Fred is currently winds at 105 miles (165 km/h) per hour and heading northwest.
ref: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.

src: 弗雷德是有衛星影像以來，大西洋東南方記錄上威力最強的熱帶颶風，卻還只 是 35°W 以東記錄上第三大颶風。
mt: Fred is the most powerful tropical storm recorded in the southeast Atlantic since satellite imagery began, yet it's only the third-largest hurricane on record east of 35°W.
ref: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 1759 年 9 月 24 日，亞瑟‧健力士簽署了愛爾蘭都柏林聖詹姆士門釀酒廠的租約，租期九千年。
mt: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a lease for St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland, for a period of nine thousand years.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.

src: 250 年後，健力士已發展為一間全球企業，每年營業額超過 100 億歐元（約 147 億美元）。
mt: After 250 years, Guinness has grown into a global company with annual sales of more than €10 billion (approximately $14.7 billion).
ref: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: A1GP 汽車大獎賽紐西蘭隊副駕駛強尼瑞德，今天合法地創下了最快速駕駛通過 48 年歷史的紐西蘭奧克蘭海灣大橋的紀錄。
mt: Johnny Red, New Zealand's copilot at the A1GP Car Grand Prix, today legally set a record for the fastest driver to cross the 48-year-old Auckland Bay Bridge in New Zealand.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.

src: 里德先生駕駛紐西蘭的 A1GP 汽車「黑美人」，以時速超過 160 公里成功過橋七次。
mt: Mr. Reed drives a New Zealand A1GP car called the Black Beauty, crossing the bridge seven times at a speed of over 160 km/h.
ref: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.

src: 因為黑美人車身太低，紐西蘭警方未能使用測速槍測得瑞德的車速，直到車速降至時速 160 公里，警察才成功測得一次。
mt: Due to the low body of Black Beauty, New Zealand police were unable to use a speedometer to measure Red's speed until the speed dropped to 160 km/h, and then the police successfully measured it once.
ref: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: 在過去 3 個月裏，中央懲處中心釋放了超過 80 名被捕人士，他們都沒有被正式起訴。
mt: Over the past three months, more than 80 arrested persons have been released from the Central Correctional Center, none of whom have been formally charged.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.

src: 今年四月，葛林法官針對監獄核發臨時禁制令，要求強制釋放在被捕後已拘留超過 24 小時但仍未收到法院通知預審的人。
mt: In April of this year, Justice Green issued a temporary injunction against the prison, demanding the release of persons who have been detained for more than 24 hours but have not received a notice from the court to pre-trial.
ref: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.

src: 如果獲得批准，法院助理法官會決定保釋金額，並正式受理執行逮捕之警員提出的指控。接下來這些指控會進入該州的電腦系統，藉以追蹤案件進度。
mt: If approved, the assistant judge will determine the amount of bail and formally accept the charges filed by the officer who carried out the arrest. These charges will then enter the state’s computer system to track the progress of the case.
ref: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.

src: 聽證會同時也確定了嫌疑犯獲得訊速審判的日期。
mt: The hearing also confirmed the date of the suspect's prompt trial.
ref: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: 澳洲財政部長彼德‧寇斯特洛，同時也是最可能接任約翰‧霍華德總理成為自由黨主席的人選，表示支持澳洲核能產業。
mt: Australian Finance Minister Peter Costello, who is also the most likely candidate to succeed John Howard as Prime Minister and become chairman of the Liberal Party, expressed support for Australia's nuclear industry.
ref: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.

src: 科斯特洛部長表示，一旦經濟方面可行，澳洲應使用核能發電。
mt: Minister Costello said that if economically feasible, Australia should use nuclear power to generate electricity.
ref: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.

src: 「一旦它能夠商業化，我們就應該要擁有。也就是說，對核能發電並沒有原則上的反對，」卡斯特洛先生說。
mt: “Once it’s commercialized, we should have it. That is to say, there’s no fundamental objection to nuclear power,” Mr. Castellón said.
ref: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.

src: Ansa 表示，警方憂心最猛烈的數起攻擊恐造成繼任之爭全面爆發。
mt: Ansa said the police are worried that the most violent attacks may lead to a full-scale succession dispute.
ref: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.

src: 警方說，洛·皮科洛之所以佔了上風是因為他在巴勒莫曾擔任普羅文察諾的左右手，較豐富的經驗為他贏得老一輩頭目的尊敬，他們依循普羅文察諾的方針，在強化權力網絡的同時，儘可能保持低調。
mt: The police said that Lo Piccolo took the upper hand because he had served as a right-hand man of Provencal in Palermo, and his rich experience earned him the respect of the older generation, who followed the policy of Provencal, while strengthening the power network while keeping a low profile as much as possible.
ref: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.

src: 這些老大在普文札諾於 1992 年結束里納針對國家發動的衝突時已被控制住，該場衝突奪走了黑手黨改革鬥士喬凡尼‧法爾康 (Giovanni Falcone) 和保羅‧波賽里尼 (Paolo Borsellino) 的性命。
mt: These bosses were controlled by the end of the 1992 conflict between Rina and the country in Pwenzano, which took the lives of Mafia reform fighters Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino.
ref: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."

src: 蘋果執行長賈伯斯展示這個裝置的方法，是在走上舞台的同時，把 iPhone 從牛仔褲口袋中拿出來。
mt: Apple's CEO Steve Jobs showed the device by taking the iPhone out of the jeans pocket as it walked onto the stage.
ref: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.

src: 在他為時 2 個小時的演說中，他表示：「今天蘋果將重新打造電話，我們會在今天創造歷史。」
mt: In his two-hour speech, he said, "Today Apple will re-create the phone, and we will make history today."
ref: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".

src: 巴西是地球上最大的羅馬天主教國家，而羅馬天主教會一向反對同性婚姻在巴西合法化。
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has always opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in Brazil.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.

src: 巴西國民議會已進行了 10 年的合法化辯論，但這樣的民事婚姻目前只有在南里約格蘭德合法。
mt: The Brazilian National Assembly has been debating legalization for 10 years, but such civil marriage is currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
ref: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.

src: 原本的法案是由前聖保羅市長瑪爾塔‧蘇普利希起草的。草擬的法案經過修改後，現已交給羅伯托‧傑弗遜處理。
mt: The original bill was drafted by the former Sao Paulo mayor, Marta Soplichi, and the draft bill has been amended and is now handled by Roberto Jefferson.
ref: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.

src: 示威者希望能夠收集一百二十萬個連署簽名，在十一月提交給國會。
mt: Protesters hope to collect 1.2 million signatures and submit them to parliament in November.
ref: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: 在許多抗拒驅逐令的家庭尋求法律援助一事浮上檯面後，東灣社區法律中心遂於 3 月 20 日為住所詐騙案的受害者辦了一場公聽會。
mt: After many families who resisted the eviction order began seeking legal aid, the Tung Wan Community Legal Center held a public hearing on March 20 for victims of housing scams.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.

src: 當房客開始分享自己所遭遇的狀況，多數捲入事件的家庭突然意識到，奧克蘭房屋委員會的 Carolyn Wilson 偷走他們的保證金並已捲款潛逃。
mt: As the tenants began to share their own experiences, most of the families involved in the incident suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the Auckland Housing Authority had stolen their deposit and had fled with the money.
ref: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.

src: 洛克伍德花園中的房客相信，可能還有 40 個或更多家庭將被逐出，因為他們明白奧克蘭住宅管理局的警察也在調查其他可能遭受住宅欺詐的奧克蘭公共住宅。
mt: Residents in Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be 40 or more families to be expelled, as they understand the Auckland Housing Authority police are also investigating other Auckland public housing that could be subject to residential fraud.
ref: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: 樂團取消了在茂宜島戰爭紀念體育場的演出，該演出原定會有 9,000 人參加，並向歌迷道歉。
mt: The band cancelled their performance at the Maui War Memorial Stadium, which was originally scheduled to attract 9,000 people and apologized to fans.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.

src: 樂團的管理公司 HK Management Inc. 在 9 月 20 日取消活動時，並未給出最初的原因，但在第二天將原因歸咎於後勤問題。
mt: The management company of the band, HK Management Inc., did not give the initial reason when the event was cancelled on September 20, but blamed it on logistical issues the next day.
ref: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: 知名的希臘律師薩基斯凱亥尤基由（Sakis Kechagioglou）和熱格尼科拉克波琉斯（George Nikolakopoulos）因為他們被判貪污和腐敗有罪，已被關在雃典的柯里達洛斯（Korydallus）看守所。
mt: Noted Greek lawyers Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos, who were found guilty of corruption and corruption, have been imprisoned in the canonical Korydallus detention center.
ref: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.

src: 為此之故，法官、律師、事務律師及檢察官過去幾年來從事過的非法行為也跟著曝光，從而揭發了希臘司法體系的大醜聞。
mt: For this reason, the illegal activities of judges, lawyers, solicitors and prosecutors over the past few years have also been exposed, thus exposing a major scandal in the Greek judicial system.
ref: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.

src: 幾個禮拜前，記者麥基斯 (Makis Triantafylopoulos) 在他於阿爾法電視台的熱門節目《Zoungla》中披露此訊息後，國會議員暨律師貝佐斯 (Petros Mantouvalos) 旋即因辦公室成員曾涉及非法賄賂和貪腐而下台。
mt: A few weeks ago, journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos revealed this in his popular Alfa TV show Zoungla, and Congressman and lawyer Petros Mantouvalos immediately stepped down as office members had been involved in illegal bribery and corruption.
ref: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.

src: 此外，首席法官依凡傑洛斯・克勞西斯因涉嫌貪瀆及墮落行為而鋃鐺入獄。
mt: In addition, the Chief Justice Ivan Javiers Klauss was imprisoned for allegedly corrupt and decadent behavior.
ref: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.

src: 羅伯茲斷然拒絕說明他所相信的生命起始點，這在墮胎倫理議題上是非常重要的問題，並表示評論特定可能的具體情況是不道德的。
mt: Roberts categorically refused to explain the starting point of life he believed in, which was an important issue on abortion ethics and stated that commenting on specific possible circumstances was unethical.
ref: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.

src: 然而，他重申了他先前的說法：「羅訴韋德案」是「國家的既定法律」，並強調了最高法院一致裁決的重要性。
mt: However, he reiterated his previous statement: "Roe v. Wade is a "established law of the state," and emphasized the importance of a unanimous decision by the Supreme Court.
ref: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.

src: 他也確認，他深信羅訴韋德案所仰賴的隱含隱私權。
mt: He also confirmed that he deeply believed in the implicit privacy rights that Roe v Wade relied on.
ref: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.

src: 馬魯基多爾隊最後摘下冠軍，領先第二名的努沙隊六分。
mt: The Marukidore team finally won the championship, leading the second-place Nusha by six points.
ref: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.

src: 兩隊將在大準決賽時碰頭，因為努沙隊以 11 分贏得比賽。
mt: The two teams will meet in the semi-finals, as Noosa won the game with 11 points.
ref: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.

src: 接著，馬魯基多爾隊在準決賽打敗了卡布丘隊。
mt: Subsequently, the Marukido team defeated the Cappuccino team in the semifinals.
ref: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.

src: 伊氏西爪龍屬於馳龍科，是迅猛龍的近親。
mt: Ichthyosaur is a member of the family Dromaeosauridae, and a close relative of the Velociraptor.
ref: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .

src: 這種全身覆蓋羽毛、溫血的猛禽據信已能以帶爪的雙腳直立行走，像迅猛龍一樣。
mt: This bird of prey, which is covered with feathers and blood, is believed to have been able to walk upright on its clawed legs, like a velociraptor.
ref: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.

src: 牠的第二隻爪比較大，使牠獲得西爪龍的封號，意指「西方之爪」。
mt: Its second claw is larger, giving it the title of Western Claw Dragon, meaning "Western Claw".
ref: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."

src: 極端天氣狀況除了會導致冰層破碎，也阻礙了救援工作。
mt: Extreme weather conditions not only cause the ice layer to break, but also hinder rescue work.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.

src: 皮特曼認為天氣狀況要到下週才有可能改善。
mt: Peteman believes that weather conditions can only be improved by next week.
ref: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.

src: 根據皮特曼的說法，這次堆冰的數量和厚度，是海豹獵人這十五年來見過最糟的情況。
mt: According to Pitman's statement, the quantity and thickness of this ice pile is the worst case that seal hunters have seen in the past 15 years.
ref: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: 今天於紅湖社區一帶流傳的消息為由於又有一名涉嫌 3 月 21 日校園槍擊案的學生被捕，因此傑夫·魏斯與九名受害者當中其三的葬禮暫停舉行。
mt: The news circulating around the Red Lake community today is that since another student suspected of being arrested on March 21 in a school shooting case, Jeff Weiss and three of the nine victims' funerals have been suspended.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.

src: 當局除了確認今日的逮捕行動之外，透露甚少訊息。
mt: In addition to confirming today's arrest actions, the authorities have revealed very little information.
ref: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.

src: 然而，有關此調查的可靠消息來源向明尼蘇達州的《明星論壇報》透露，那其實是路易·喬丹，他是紅湖部落酋長弗洛伊德·喬丹的 16 歲兒子。
mt: However, reliable sources for this investigation revealed to the Minnesota Star Forum that it was actually Louis Jordan, a 16-year-old son of Freud Jordan, Chief of the Red Lake Tribes.
ref: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.

src: 目前尚不知道會提出什麼樣的指控，或使有關當局找上那名男孩的原因，但聯邦法院已開始進行少年訴訟程序。
mt: Currently, it is unclear what kind of accusations will be made, or the reason why relevant authorities have found the boy, but federal courts have begun to conduct juvenile lawsuit procedures.
ref: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: 羅汀還說，官方決定取消第兩輪決選，以為阿富汗節省經費並避免再次選舉產生的安全風險。
mt: Rotin also said that the official decided to cancel the second round of the election, thinking Afghanistan would save money and avoid the safety risks generated by the re-election.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.

src: 外交人員說他們已在阿富汗憲法中找到足夠的歧義，因此決定沒有必要進行決選投票。
mt: Diplomats say they have found sufficient ambiguity in the Afghan Constitution, so they decided there is no need to hold a runoff vote.
ref: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.

src: 這與之前的報告互相矛盾，後者曾表示取消第二輪選舉將違反憲法。
mt: This contradicts previous reports, which had stated that cancelling the second round of elections would violate the Constitution.
ref: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: 飛機原定由內務部內衛部隊駕駛飛往伊爾庫次克。
mt: The plane was originally scheduled to be flown by the Interior Ministry's Interior Ministry's Internal Defense Force to Irkutsk.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.

src: 一支調查小組奉命成立。
mt: An investigation team was ordered to be established.
ref: An inquiry was established to investigate.

src: 伊爾-76 自 1970 年代起即為俄羅斯及蘇聯軍事重要的一部分，上個月已經在俄羅斯發生一起重大事故。
mt: The Il-76 has been an important part of the military affairs of Russia and the Soviet Union since the 1970s, with a major accident in Russia last month.
ref: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.

src: 10 月 7 日，一架引擎在起飛時脫落，無人受傷。事故發生後，俄羅斯短暫停飛了 Il-76。
mt: On October 7, an engine fell off during takeoff and no one was injured. The Russians temporarily grounded the Il-76 after the accident.
ref: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: 數千桶原油在阿拉斯加費爾班克斯以南外漏之後， 800 英里的縱貫阿拉斯加管道遭到關閉。
mt: Thousands of barrels of crude oil spilled south of Fairbanks in Alaska, and 800 miles of trans-Alaska pipelines were closed.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

src: 斷電之後，隨之而來的是常規的火災指揮系統測試，導致放洩閥開啟，使原油流洩到附近的格里利堡 9 號泵站。
mt: Following the power outage, a standard fire command system test followed, causing the release valve to open, causing the oil to leak into the nearby Greliburg No. 9 pump station.
ref: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.

src: 開啟的閥門導致系統壓力釋放，原油則自能儲存 55,000 桶（230 萬加侖）的油槽溢出至輸送平台。
mt: Opened valves release system pressure, while crude oil can store 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons) of oil spills into the conveying platform.
ref: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).

src: 截至週三下午，油槽排氣孔仍在漏油，可能是油槽內部的熱膨脹所致。
mt: As of Wednesday afternoon, the exhaust holes in the oil tank are still leaking, possibly due to thermal expansion inside the tank.
ref: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.

src: 油槽下方有另一個能容納 104,500 桶的第二攔油區，目前尚未裝滿。
mt: Below the oil tank is another 104,500-barrel second oil block, which has not yet been fully loaded.
ref: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: 在電視上直播的評論中，伊朗高層消息來源首次承認制裁有產生影響。
mt: In live comments on TV, Iran's top sources for the first time acknowledged that sanctions had an impact.
ref: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.

src: 其中包含了金融限制，以及禁止原油出口至歐盟，後者佔伊朗經濟中國外收益的 80%。
mt: Among them are financial restrictions, as well as a ban on oil exports to the EU, which accounts for 80% of Iran's economic and foreign earnings.
ref: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.

src: 在最近一期的月報中，石油輸出國組織表示原油的出口降到了 20 年來的新低，一天只有 280 萬桶。
mt: In the most recent monthly report, the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reported that oil exports had dropped to a new low in 20 years, with only 2.8 million barrels a day.
ref: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.

src: 該國最高領袖大阿亞圖拉賽義德阿里·哈米尼曾形容，對石油的依賴是一個早在 1979 年伊朗伊斯蘭革命之前就出現的「陷阱」，而伊朗應該從中解放出來。
mt: The country's highest leader, Grand Ayatollah Sayyid Ali Khameni, once described its dependence on oil as a "trap" that appeared before the 1979 Iranian Islamic Revolution, and Iran should be liberated from it.
ref: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.

src: 當太空艙在大約凌晨 5 點 (美東時間) 抵達地球並進入大氣層時，預計將會為北加州、奧瑞岡州、內華達州和猶他州居民上演一場精采燈光秀。
mt: When the capsule arrives at Earth around 5 a.m. Eastern Time and enters the atmosphere, a spectacular light show is expected to be staged for residents of Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.

src: 太空艙會像流星一樣劃過天際。
mt: The spacecraft will cross the sky like a meteor.
ref: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.

src: 太空艙以每秒 12.8 公里或 8 英里的速率前進，這個速度足以在一分鐘內從舊金山抵達洛杉磯。
mt: The spacecraft is moving at a rate of 12.8 km/s or 8 miles per second, enough to reach Los Angeles from San Francisco in one minute.
ref: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.

src: 星塵號將是最快返回地球的太空船並因而創下新的歷史紀錄，打破 1969 年 5 月阿波羅 10 號指揮艙返航時所創的舊紀錄。
mt: The Stardust will be the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth and thus set a new historical record, breaking the previous record set by Apollo 10 command module's return in May 1969.
ref: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.

src: Stardust 專案經理湯姆．達克斯伯里 (Tom Duxbury) 表示：「它將飛越北加州的西海岸，照亮從加州到俄勒岡州中部，再經由內華達州及愛達荷州直到猶他州的天空。」
mt: Tom Duxbury, Project Manager, Stardust, said, “It will fly across the West Coast of Northern California, illuminating from California to central Oregon, through Nevada and Idaho to the skies of Utah.”
ref: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: 陸克文簽署京都氣候協定的決定將美國置於孤立之境，現在美國將是唯一沒有批准該協議的已開發國家。
mt: The decision to sign the Kyoto Climate Agreement placed the United States in an isolated environment, and now the United States will be the only developed country that has not approved the agreement.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.

src: 澳洲前保守派政府拒絕批准《京都議定書》，聲稱其會對高度依賴煤炭出口的經濟造成損害，而印度和中國等國卻不受碳排放指標的約束。
mt: Australian conservative governments have refused to approve the Kyoto Protocol, claiming it would harm economies heavily reliant on coal exports, while India and China are not bound by carbon emissions indicators.
ref: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: 這是 eBay 歷史上所進行的最大收購。
mt: This is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.

src: 該公司希望將其利潤來源多元化，並在中國、東歐及巴西等 Skype 佔據優勢的地區增加知名度。
mt: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and increase its popularity in areas where Skype occupies an advantage in China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: 科學家懷疑土衛二的地表活動活躍，可能是土星冰狀 E 環的來源。
mt: Scientists suspect that the surface activity of Enceladus is active, possibly a source of Saturn's icy E ring.
ref: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.

src: 土衛二是太陽系中反射率最高的星體，能反射約 90% 抵達其表面的太陽光。
mt: Enceladus is the most reflective star in the solar system, reflecting about 90% of the sunlight that reaches its surface.
ref: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.

src: 遊戲發行商科樂美今日於一家日本報紙發表聲明，表示不會發表《法魯加六日》這款遊戲。
mt: Game publisher Konami today issued a statement in a Japanese newspaper, stating that they will not publish the game "Faluga Six Days".
ref: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.

src: 遊戲以第二次法魯加戰役為背景，這是一場美國和伊拉克軍隊之間的惡鬥。
mt: The game is set against the backdrop of the Second Battle of Faruga, a fierce battle between American and Iraqi troops.
ref: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.

src: 澳洲通訊及媒體局 (ACMA) 也發現，雖然影片在網路上流傳，《老大哥》節目卻沒有違反線上內容審查法，因為影片並非儲存在《老大哥》的網站上。
mt: The Australian Communications and Media Authority (ACMA) has also found that while the video has been circulating online, the Big Brother program does not violate the online content censorship law because the video is not stored on Big Brother's website.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.

src: 《廣播服務法》提供網際網路內容的監管規則，然而若要被視為網際網路內容，必須實體上存在於伺服器上。
mt: The Broadcasting Services Act provides rules governing Internet content, but to be considered as Internet content, it must be physically present on the server.
ref: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: 位在肯亞奈洛比的美國大使館發布一項警告，聲明「索馬利亞的極端主義者」正打算在肯亞和衣索比亞發動自殺炸彈攻擊。
mt: The US embassy in Nairobi, Kenya issued a warning stating that "extremists in Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bombing attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
ref: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.

src: 美國表示曾經接獲匿名資訊，訊息中特別提到將以自殺炸彈客的方式炸毀衣索比亞和肯亞的「著名地標」。
mt: The United States has received anonymous information, particularly mentioning that it will use suicide bombers to destroy "famous landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.

src: 早在《每日秀》和《科拜爾報告》之前，1988 年赫克和詹森還是華盛頓大學的學生時，便已設想出一種以諷刺滑稽的方式模仿新聞和新聞報導的刊物。
mt: Even before The Daily Show and The Cobyl Report, in 1988, when Heck and Johnson were still students at the University of Washington, they had already conceived a satirical way to imitate news and news reporting.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.

src: 自成立以來，洋蔥報已經成為一個名符其實的惡搞新聞王國，旗下事業囊括了印刷版新聞、光十月單月就吸引了 5 百萬獨立讀者的網站、個人廣告、24 小時新聞網、podcast、以及最近新發行的世界地圖集《Our Dumb World》。
mt: Since its inception, Onion has become a true parody news empire, with its business covering printed edition news, websites attracting five million independent readers in October alone, personal ads, 24-hour news networks, podcasts, and recently released world map collection Our Dumb World.
ref: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src: 艾爾·高爾和湯米·弗蘭克斯將軍不假思索地說出了他們最喜歡的頭條新聞（高爾的便是《洋蔥報》有關他和蒂珀在 2000 年選舉人團落敗後享受了一生中最美好的性愛的報導）。
mt: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks unthinkingly reported their favorite headline news (Gall's is a report by The Onion that he and Tipper enjoyed the most beautiful sex of their lives after losing to the Electoral College in 2000).
ref: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).

src: 許多《洋蔥報》的作者持續對喬恩・史都華及史蒂芬・荷伯的新聞脫口秀造成大幅的影響。
mt: Many of the authors of The Onion have continued to have a significant impact on Jon Stewart and Stephen Rob's news talk shows.
ref: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: 此藝術活動也是布加勒斯特市政廳舉辦的一場活動的一部分，該活動試圖將羅馬尼亞首都的形象，重新塑造成具有創意且多采多姿的大都會。
mt: This artistic activity is also part of an event held by the Bucharest City Hall, which attempts to reshape the image of Romania's capital into a creative and colorful metropolis.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.

src: 該城市將成為東南歐首座主辦奔牛藝術節城市。奔牛藝術節是世界上最盛大的公共藝術活動，今年將在六月到八月間舉辦。
mt: The city will be the first host city in Southeastern Europe to host the Bull Run Festival. The Bull Run is the world’s largest public art event and will be held from June to August this year.
ref: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: 今天的公告也延續了政府在今年三月所說、將撥款購買更多車廂的承諾。
mt: Today's announcement continues the government's commitment to allocate funds for more cars, which was announced in March of this year.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages.

src: 加上 300 個車廂後得到的 1,300 個車輛可紓解擁擠人潮。
mt: Adding 1,300 vehicles in 300 cars can alleviate congestion.
ref: An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: 洛杉磯警局發言人克里斯多夫．賈西亞表示，該名男性嫌疑犯正以非法侵入罪名接受調查，而非破壞公物。
mt: Los Angeles Police Department spokesperson Christopher Garcia said the male suspect is being investigated on charges of trespassing rather than sabotage.
ref: Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.

src: 標誌沒有遭到實際損壞，而是用有和平與心型符號裝飾的黑色防水布將字母「O」改成小寫的字母「e」。
mt: The logo was not actually damaged, but instead had a black waterproof cloth decorated with peace and heart-shaped symbols change the letter "O" to a lowercase letter "e".
ref: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".

src: 腰鞭毛藻是一種天然生成的單細胞海洋微生物，當此生物的濃度比平常高時，就會出現紅潮。
mt: Waist flagella is a naturally occurring single-celled ocean microbe, when the concentration of this organism is higher than usual, red tide will appear.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.

src: 自然因素可以交互作用產生理想的環境，讓這種藻類的數量急速增加。
mt: Natural factors can interact to produce an ideal environment, leading to a rapid increase in the number of this type of algae.
ref: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.

src: 這種藻類會產生神經毒素，癱瘓人類和魚類的神經。
mt: This type of algae will produce neurotoxins, paralyzing the nerves of humans and fish.
ref: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.

src: 魚類常死於水中高濃度的毒素。
mt: Fish often die from high concentrations of toxins in water.
ref: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.

src: 人類可能會吸入被風和海浪帶入空中的含毒水，因而受到影響。
mt: Humans may inhale toxic water brought into the air by wind and waves, thus being affected.
ref: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: 熱帶氣旋古努（以馬爾地夫當地語言的棕梠葉袋子為名）的最高持續風速達到每小時 240 公里（每小時 149 英里）。
mt: Tropical Storm Gunnu (named after the palm leaf pouch in the local language of Maldives) has a maximum sustained wind speed of 240 km/h (149 mph).
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .

src: 今日稍早時，風速約每小時 83 公里，且預期會持續減弱。
mt: Earlier today, the wind speed was approximately 83 km/h, and it is expected to continue to weaken.
ref: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: 週三，基於新冠病毒 (COVID-19) 疫情的考量，美國國家籃球協會 (NBA) 宣布暫停其職業籃球賽季。
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) announced that its professional basketball season will be suspended due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.

src: 一名猶他爵士隊球員確診新冠病毒之後，NBA 做出此決定。
mt: After a Utah Jazz player was diagnosed with COVID-19, the NBA made this decision.
ref: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: 「根據這顆化石，那意味著演化分家比分子證據所預料的要早得多。
mt: "According to this fossil, it means that evolutionary dissociation is much earlier than molecular evidence predicts.
ref: "Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence.

src: 「這意味著所有事情都必須往前推，」衣索比亞「裂谷研究服務」的研究員、也是此研究的共同作者──伯爾漢·阿斯法說道。
mt: "This means that everything must be pushed forward," says Bernhard Asfa, a researcher at the "Rifle Valley Research Service" in Ethiopia and co-author of the study.
ref: That means everything has to be put back," said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw.

src: 直至現在，由於美國境內的廣泛使用，AOL 已能夠以自己的步調轉移與發展即時通訊市場。
mt: Until now, due to widespread use within the United States, AOL has been able to move and develop the instant messaging market at its own pace.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States.

src: 在這樣的安排下，這種自由可能會告終。
mt: In such an arrangement, this freedom may end.
ref: With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end.

src: 雅虎和微軟服務的使用者人數加總，將可匹敵 AOL 的客戶數量。
mt: The combined number of users of Yahoo and Microsoft services will match the number of AOL customers.
ref: The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: 在傳出銀行獲得英國政府緊急紓困的消息後，北岩銀行於 2008 年國有化。
mt: Following the news that the bank had received emergency relief from the British government, North Rock Bank was nationalized in 2008.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government.

src: 北岩銀行受 2007 年的次級房貸危機影響而請求協助。
mt: The Bank of Northern Rock requested assistance due to the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis.
ref: Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007.

src: 理查‧布蘭森爵士的維珍集團在該銀行國有化之前曾出價收購但遭拒。
mt: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had offered to buy the bank before it was nationalized, but was rejected.
ref: Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation.

src: 2010 年，如今的高街銀行北岩銀行公眾有限公司儘管已經國有化，但卻從被稱為「壞銀行」的北岩（資產管理）分離出來。
mt: In 2010, although today's Kao Street Bank North Rock Bank Public Limited has been nationalized, it was separated from the "bad bank" of North Rock (asset management).
ref: In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management).

src: 維珍集團只購買了北岩銀行旗下的「優良銀行」，而非該資產管理公司。
mt: Virgin Group only purchased "Good Bank" under North Rock Bank, rather than the asset management company.
ref: Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: 據信這是史上第五次人類發現並經由化學方式證明有火星物質掉落到地球上。
mt: It is believed that this is the fifth time in history that humans have discovered and chemically proven to have Martian material fall onto Earth.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.

src: 地球上將近兩萬四千顆已知的隕石中，只有 34 顆確定來自火星。
mt: Of the nearly 24,000 known meteorites on Earth, only 34 are confirmed to be from Mars.
ref: Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin.

src: 其中十五顆岩石來自去年七月的流星雨。
mt: Fifteen of these rocks are from last July's meteor shower.
ref: Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July.

src: 有些地球上非常少見的石頭以每盎司 11,000 到 22,500 美元的價格販售，約是黃金價格的 10 倍。
mt: Some rare stones on Earth are sold at a price of $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, roughly ten times the price of gold.
ref: Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: 比賽結束後，凱瑟洛夫斯基以 2,250 的積分保持車手排行榜的領先地位。
mt: After the race ended, Kesselovsky maintained a leading position in the drivers' standings with 2,250 points.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points.

src: 強森獲得 2,243 分，以七分之差的成績屈居第二。
mt: Johnson scored 2,243 points, finishing second by a margin of seven points.
ref: Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243.

src: 第三名漢姆林落後 20 分，但領先波伊爾 5 分。卡恩和小楚克斯分別以 2220 分和 2207 分位居第五和第六名。
mt: Third place Hamlin trailed by 20 points, but was five points ahead of Boyle. Kane and Chux finished fifth and sixth respectively with 2220 and 2207.
ref: In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points.

src: 在賽季仍剩四場賽事的情況下，史都華、戈登、肯瑟斯和哈維克分佔了車手冠軍排行榜的前十名。
mt: With four races remaining in the season, Stewart, Gordon, Kensers and Hawick took the top ten of the drivers' championship standings.
ref: Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: 美國海軍表示他們正在調查該起事件。
mt: The U.S. Navy said they are investigating the incident.
ref: The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident.

src: 他們也在一項聲明中表示：「全體船員正努力尋求將船安全拖出的方法。」
mt: They also said in a statement: "All crew members are working hard to find a way to safely drag the ship out."
ref: They also said in a statement, "The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship".

src: 該艦是復仇者級的反水雷艦，當時正前往巴拉望的普林塞薩港。
mt: The ship was a Avengers-class anti-mine ship, at the time heading for Palawan's Prinzesa port.
ref: An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan.

src: 這艘船被派給美國海軍的第七艦隊，並常駐日本長崎的佐世保市。
mt: This ship was assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the United States Navy and stationed in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.

src: 孟買恐攻者在 2008 年 11 月 26 日搭船抵達，他們攜帶著手榴彈和自動武器，並攻擊多個目標，包括擁擠的賈特拉帕蒂·希瓦吉終點站和著名的泰姬瑪哈酒店。
mt: The Mumbai Terrorizers arrived by boat on November 26, 2008, carrying hand grenades and automatic weapons and attacking multiple targets, including the crowded Jatrapati Shivaji Terminal and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel.

src: 大衛·韓德利的偵查與資訊聚會促成了由 10 名來自巴基斯坦激進組織虔誠軍的槍手所為的行動。
mt: David Handley's reconnaissance and information gathering led to the action of 10 gunmen from Pakistan's radical organization Pious Army.
ref: David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba.

src: 此攻擊為印度和巴基斯坦間的關係帶來巨大壓力。
mt: This attack brought enormous pressure on relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: 在那些官員的陪同下，他向德州居民保證已採取措施保護公眾安全。
mt: Accompanied by those officials, he assured the residents of Texas that measures had been taken to protect public safety.
ref: Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety.

src: 佩里明確指出：「全世界幾乎找不到其他地方比我們準備更周全，足以面對這個案例帶來的挑戰。」
mt: Perry points out, "There's almost no other place in the world that's more comprehensive than we are, and that's enough to face the challenges that this case brings."
ref: Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."

src: 州長也表示：「今天，我們得知有些學齡兒童確定曾與病患接觸。」
mt: "Today, we know that some school-age children are certain to have contact with patients," the governor said.
ref: The governor also stated, "Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."

src: 他繼續說道：「這個案子非常嚴重。但可以放心的是，我們的系統運作一如它應有的水準。」
mt: "This case is very serious," he continued. "But it's safe to say that our system works just as it should."
ref: He went on to say, "This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."

src: 確認為真的話，這個發現會讓艾倫八年來搜尋武藏號的工作畫下句點。
mt: If confirmed to be true, this discovery would bring an end to Alan's eight-year search for the Musashi.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi.

src: 完成海床繪圖之後，總算以 ROV 找到了沉船。
mt: After drawing the seafloor, I finally found the wreck with ROV.
ref: Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV.

src: 據報導，身為世界上最富有的人之一，艾倫已將大部分財產投入於海洋探勘中，並出於對戰爭的畢生興趣，開始尋找武藏號。
mt: According to reports, as one of the richest people in the world, Allen has invested most of his assets in ocean exploration and started searching for the Musashi from his lifelong interest in war.
ref: One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: 她在亞特蘭大服務期間獲得高度評價，並因創新的城市教育受到肯定。
mt: She received high praise during her service in Atlanta and was praised for her innovative city education.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education.

src: 她於 2009 年獲頒年度國家教育局長的頭銜。
mt: In 2009, she was awarded the title of National Education Minister.
ref: In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year.

src: 在她獲此殊榮之時，亞特蘭大的學校在考試成績上已有大幅提升。
mt: At the time she was awarded this honor, Atlanta's school had already significantly improved its examination results.
ref: At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores.

src: 不久之後，亞特蘭大憲法報發布了一份報告，指出測試結果存在問題。
mt: Shortly afterwards, the Atlanta Constitution published a report stating that there were problems with the test results.
ref: Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results.

src: 此報告顯示測驗分數進步速度之快令人難以置信，並指出學校有進行內部調查，但並未對結果採許行動。
mt: This report shows that the speed of improvement in test scores is unbelievable, and points out that schools have conducted internal investigations but did not take action on the results.
ref: The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings.

src: 此後，有證據顯示試卷經過竄改。霍爾與其他 34 名教育官員在 2013 年被起訴。
mt: Since then, there has been evidence that the papers have been tampered with. Hall and 34 other education officials were charged in 2013.
ref: Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: 愛爾蘭政府強調議會立法改正此狀況的迫切性。
mt: The Irish government emphasized the urgency of legislation to correct this situation.
ref: The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation.

src: 「就公衛和刑事司法的立場而言，現在最重要的是應盡快頒布法令」，一名政府發言人說道。
mt: "From the standpoint of public health and criminal justice, the most important thing now is to quickly enact laws," says a government spokesman.
ref: "It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible", said a government spokesperson.

src: 對於趁機利用相關物質的暫時合法性的個人之健康，以及自目前違憲變更生效後毒品相關犯罪的判決，衛生部長都表達了關切之意。
mt: The Minister of Health has expressed concern over the health of individuals who take advantage of the temporary legality of using relevant substances, as well as the judgment on drug-related crimes since the unconstitutional change took effect.
ref: The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect.

src: Jarque 當天稍早在義大利的 Coverciano 進行季前訓練。他在預定週日與 Bolonia 的對戰之前，都待在球隊住宿的飯店中。
mt: Jarque started pre-season training with Coverciano in Italy earlier that day. He stayed at the team’s hotel until his scheduled Sunday match against Bolonia.
ref: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: 在星期天對戰波隆那的球賽之前，他一直待在球隊下榻的飯店裡。
mt: Before Sunday's match against Bologna, he had been staying at the team's hotel.
ref: He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: 這輛遊覽車是要前往密蘇里的聖路易六旗樂園，該樂團要在那裡開一場座無虛席的演唱會。
mt: This tour bus is going to Missouri's St. Louis Six Flags Park, where the band will hold a flawless concert.
ref: The bus was headed to Six Flags St. Louis in Missouri for the band to play to a sold-out crowd.

src: 據目擊者所述，周六凌晨 1:15 公車在綠燈通行時，汽車在公車前方轉了一個彎。
mt: According to eyewitnesses, at 1:15 a.m. on Saturday, when the bus was passing through a green light, the car turned a bend in front of the bus.
ref: At 1:15 a.m. Saturday, according to witnesses, the bus was going through a green light when the car made a turn in front of it.

src: 截至 8 月 9 日晚間，莫拉克颱風的颱風眼距離中國福建省約有七十公里。
mt: As of the evening of August 9, the eye of Typhoon Morakot is about 70 kilometers away from Fujian Province in China.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian.

src: 預計颱風會以時速 11 公里往中國前進。
mt: The typhoon is expected to move towards China at a speed of 11 km/h.
ref: The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: 在華氏 90 度的高溫中，等待中的乘客得以補充水份。
mt: At a temperature of 90 degrees Fahrenheit, waiting passengers are able to replenish their water.
ref: Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat.

src: 消防隊長史考特·考恩斯說：「那天聖塔克拉拉非常炎熱，氣溫為華氏 90 幾度。」
mt: Fire chief Scott Coones said, "That day Santa Clara was very hot with temperatures of 90 degrees Fahrenheit."
ref: Fire captain Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s.

src: 退一步來說，無論困在雲霄飛車上的時間長短，這都是令人非常不舒服的經歷，而且至少要花一個小時才能把第一個人從雲霄飛車上救下來。」
mt: Take a step back and say that no matter how long you're stuck on a roller coaster ride, it's a very uncomfortable experience, and it's going to take at least an hour to get the first person out of the roller coaster."
ref: Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."

src: 曾七度贏得一級方程式冠軍，已於 2006 年退休的舒馬克原訂要取代受傷之費利佩·馬薩出賽。
mt: Schumacher, who had won the Formula One championship seven times and retired in 2006, was originally scheduled to replace injured Felipe Massa.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa.

src: 這位巴西人在 2009 年匈牙利大獎賽中遭遇車禍，頭部嚴重傷害。
mt: The Brazilian suffered serious head injuries in a car accident at the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: 因此馬薩至少會缺席 2009 年賽季的剩餘賽事。
mt: Therefore, Massa will be absent from at least the remaining matches of the 2009 season.
ref: Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: 總理大臣羅德里戈·阿里亞斯表示，檢查證實他有病毒的輕微症狀。
mt: Prime Minister Rodrigo Alias stated that the examination confirmed he had mild symptoms of the virus.
ref: Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said.

src: 總統目前病情穩定，但依然要在家隔離幾天。
mt: The president's condition is currently stable, but he still needs to be isolated at home for a few days.
ref: The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days.

src: 「除了發燒和喉嚨痛之外，我覺得很健康、身體狀況良好，可以用遠端的方式繼續工作。
mt: "In addition to fever and sore throats, I feel very healthy and in good physical condition, so I can continue to work remotely.
ref: "Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting.

src: 阿里亞斯在一份聲明中表示：「我希望在週一返回我的工作崗位。」
mt: Arias said in a statement: "I want to return to my job on Monday."
ref: I expect to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement.

src: 原為薩菲爾-辛普森颶風風力等級分類中第四級颶風的費莉希亞在星期二消散前減弱為熱帶低氣壓。
mt: Felicia, which was a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Wind Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before it dissipated on Tuesday.
ref: Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday.

src: 它的殘餘影響為多數島嶼帶來陣雨，不過迄今為止，還沒有災害或洪水的報導。
mt: Its residual impact brings showers to most islands, but so far, there have been no reports of disasters or floods.
ref: Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported.

src: 歐胡島的降水量經估量已來到 6.34 英寸，可說是「很有幫助」。
mt: The estimated rainfall on Oahu Island has already reached 6.34 inches, which is "helpful."
ref: The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as "beneficial".

src: 有時降雨會伴隨著雷鳴與經常性的閃電。
mt: Sometimes rainfall is accompanied by thunder and frequent lightning.
ref: Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.

src: 這架巴布亞紐幾內亞航空航班編號 CG4684 的雙水獺飛機，昨天試圖降落在科科達，但已經失敗過一次。
mt: This Papua New Guinean airline flight number CG4684 twin-tailed otter aircraft attempted to land in Kokoda yesterday, but had failed once.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already.

src: 它消失在第二次試圖降落過程中即將著陸的十分鐘前。
mt: It disappeared 10 minutes before landing during the second attempt to land.
ref: About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared.

src: 墜機地點已於今日確認，且因該地點難以到達，因此由兩名警員空降至叢林裡，以便步行至事故現場尋找倖存者。
mt: The crash site has been confirmed to this day, and since the location is difficult to reach, two police officers parachuted into the jungle in order to walk to the scene of the accident to search for survivors.
ref: The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors.

src: 搜索行動同樣受到導致無法降落的惡劣天氣阻礙。
mt: The search operation was also hindered by severe weather that prevented it from landing.
ref: The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: 根據報導，馬克白街上的一棟公寓因瓦斯外洩而爆炸。
mt: According to reports, an apartment building on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak.

src: 在鄰居打電話通報瓦斯洩漏之後，一名瓦斯公司人員隨即到場勘查。
mt: After a neighbor called to report a gas leak, an employee from the gas company immediately arrived to investigate.
ref: An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak.

src: 該主管到場時，公寓已發生爆炸。
mt: When the manager arrived, an explosion had already occurred in the apartment.
ref: When the official arrived, the apartment exploded.

src: 無任何重大傷亡匯報，但爆炸發生時，現場至少有五人因產生休克症狀而接受治療。
mt: No major casualties were reported, but at least five people were treated for shock symptoms when the explosion occurred.
ref: No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock.

src: 公寓內沒有任何人。
mt: There is no one in the apartment.
ref: No one was inside the apartment.

src: 當時，從該地區撤離了將近 100 位居民。
mt: At that time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: 高爾夫球和英式橄欖球都將重返奧運會。
mt: Both golf and rugby will return to the Olympics.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games.

src: 國際奧委會今日於柏林舉行的執行委員會會議中，投票決定將納入比賽的運動種類。英式橄欖球，精確來說是七人制橄欖球，以及高爾夫球，勝過其他五項運動，被列為奧運項目。
mt: At the IOC Executive Committee meeting in Berlin today, a vote was made to include the type of sport to be included in the competition. British rugby, to be precise, is a seven-a-side rugby and golf, more than the other five sports, is listed as an Olympic event.
ref: The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics.

src: 壁球、空手道和滑輪溜冰就像棒球與壘球，都試圖躋身奧運項目，但在 2005 年的投票表決中紛紛落選。
mt: Squash, karate and roller skating are like baseball and softball, both trying to qualify for the Olympics, but they lost in a 2005 vote.
ref: Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005.

src: 表決仍需在 10 月份的哥本哈根會議上經國際奧林匹克委員會全體委員批准。
mt: The vote still needs to be approved by the entire International Olympic Committee at the Copenhagen Conference in October.
ref: The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 並非所有人都支持加入女性的排名。
mt: Not everyone supports joining women's rankings.
ref: Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks.

src: 2004 年奧運銀牌得主阿米爾·汗說：「我深深認為女性不該參與打鬥。這就是我的想法。」
mt: "I deeply believe that women shouldn't fight," said Amir Khan, a silver medalist at the 2004 Olympics. "That's what I think."
ref: 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, "Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."

src: 儘管他做出那樣的評論，他仍表示會支持 2012 年倫敦奧運的英國參賽者。
mt: Despite his comments, he still expressed support for British competitors at the 2012 London Olympics.
ref: Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London.

src: 審判在伯明翰皇室法院進行，並在 8 月 3 日結束。
mt: The trial took place at the Birmingham Royal Court and ended on August 3.
ref: The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3.

src: 當場被捕的主播否認自己的攻擊行為，聲稱棍子是用來保護自己，因為有多達 30 個人朝他扔瓶子。
mt: The anchor arrested on the spot denied his own aggressive behavior, claiming that the stick was used to protect himself because as many as 30 people threw bottles at him.
ref: The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people.

src: 布雷克也被以企圖妨礙司法公正定罪。
mt: Blake was also convicted of attempting to obstruct justice.
ref: Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice.

src: 法官告訴布雷克，他「幾乎必定」會被送進監獄。
mt: The judge told Blake that he "almost certainly" would be sent to prison.
ref: The judge told Blake it was "almost inevitable" he was going to be sent to jail.

src: 暗能量是一種完全看不見的力量，不斷作用於宇宙中。
mt: Dark energy is a completely invisible force that continuously acts on the universe.
ref: Dark energy is a completely invisible force that is constantly acting upon the universe.

src: 人們因為它對宇宙膨脹的影響才確知它的存在。
mt: People know its existence only because of its impact on the expansion of the universe.
ref: Its existence is known only because of its effects on the expansion of the universe.

src: 科學家發現月球表面分布許多稱為瓣狀陡坡的地形，顯然是因為月球正極緩慢縮小而形成。
mt: Scientists have found that the lunar surface is distributed with many terrains called flaps, which are obviously formed because the moon's positive pole is slowly shrinking.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly.

src: 月球上到處都是這種陡坡，而且風化程度很小，這顯示創造陡坡的地質事件發生於不久之前。
mt: The lunar surface is full of such steep slopes, and the degree of weathering is very small, indicating that the geological event that created the steep slope occurred shortly before.
ref: These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent.

src: 此理論與月球完全沒有地質活動的說法相違悖。
mt: This theory contradicts the theory that the moon has no geological activity at all.
ref: This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: 據說這名男子駕著一輛裝有炸藥的三輪車衝進人群。
mt: It is said that this man drove a three-wheeled car loaded with explosives into the crowd.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd.

src: 涉嫌引爆炸彈的男子，在爆炸中受傷後被拘留。
mt: A man suspected of detonating a bomb was detained after being injured in the explosion.
ref: The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast.

src: 有關當局還不知道他的名字，但他們知道他是維吾爾族的一份子。
mt: The authorities still don't know his name, but they know he is a member of the Uyghur people.
ref: His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: 2007 年 9 月 17 日，納迪亞 (Nadia) 於俄羅斯阿列伊斯克的一間婦產科診所以剖腹產方式出生，體重重達 17 磅又 1盎司。
mt: On September 17, 2007, Nadia was born via cesarean section at an obstetrics clinic in Aleysk, Russia, weighing 17 pounds and 1 oz.
ref: Nadia, born on September 17, 2007, by Cesarean section at a maternity clinic in Aleisk, Russia, weighed in at a massive 17 pounds 1 ounce.

src: 「我們真的都嚇呆了」這位母親表示。
mt: "We're all really freaked out," said the mother.
ref: "We were all simply in shock," the mother stated.

src: 當被問到父親說了什麼時，她回答：「他說不出話來，就只是站在那兒眨著眼。」
mt: When asked what her father had said, she replied, "If he can't say anything, he just stands there and blinks."
ref: When asked what the father said, she answered "He couldn't say a thing - he just stood there blinking."

src: 「它的特性就跟水一樣。透明如水。
mt: "It's just like water. It's as transparent as water.
ref: "It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is.

src: 因此，若你站在岸邊，你將能往下看到底部的鵝卵石或泥濘等東西。
mt: Therefore, if you stand on the shore, you will be able to see things like pebbles or mud at the bottom.
ref: So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom.

src: 據我們所知，只有一個天體比泰坦星更有活力，它就叫地球。」斯托凡補充說。
mt: As far as we know, only one celestial body is more energetic than Titan, and it's called Earth, "says Stofan.
ref: As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth," added Stofan.

src: 問題始於 1 月 1 號，多位當地居民開始向尾花澤市郵局抱怨他們沒有收到以往都會寄達的傳統新年卡片。
mt: The problem began on January 1, when local residents complained to the Ookaze Post Office that they had not received traditional New Year cards that they had always sent.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards.

src: 昨天，郵局發現男孩藏了 600 多封的郵遞文件（含 429 張新年賀卡）未遞送給預定收件人後，已向市民與媒體公開道歉。
mt: Yesterday, the post office found that the boy had hidden more than 600 mail documents (including 429 New Year cards) and had not delivered them to the intended recipient, and has since apologized to citizens and the media.
ref: Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: 無人月球軌道探測器月船 1 號彈出月球撞擊探測器 (MIP)，以每秒 1.5 公里（時速 3000 英里）的速度在月球表面飛馳，成功在月球南極點附近強行著陸。
mt: The unmanned lunar orbiter, Lunar Ship 1, ejected the Moon Impact Probe (MIP), flying at a speed of 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour) on the lunar surface and successfully landed near the South Pole of the Moon.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole.

src: 除攜帶三項重要科學儀器外，印度月球探測器還在儀器各面彩繪，帶上印度國旗圖像。
mt: In addition to carrying three important scientific instruments, the Indian lunar probe is also painted on each side of the instrument, with an image of the Indian national flag on it.
ref: Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: 「感謝那些支持像我這樣的囚犯的人，」西里彭在記者會上這樣說道。
mt: "Thank you to those who support prisoners like me," said Siripend at a press conference.
ref: "Thanks for those who supported a convict like me," Siriporn was quoted as saying at a press conference.

src: 「有些人也許不同意，但我不在乎。
mt: "Some people might disagree, but I don't care.
ref: "Some may not agree but I don't care.

src: 很高興看到有人挺我。
mt: I'm glad to see someone supporting me.
ref: I am happy that there are people willing to support me.

src: 自 1947 年脫離英國統治獨立後，巴基斯坦總統會任命「政治代理人」來管理聯邦直轄部落地區，後者對於這些地區幾乎有完全的自治權。
mt: Since independence from British rule in 1947, the President of Pakistan has appointed "political representatives" to manage federally administered tribal areas, which have almost complete autonomy for these areas.
ref: Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed "Political Agents" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas.

src: 根據巴基斯坦憲法第 247 條，這些官員需負責治理與提供司法服務。
mt: Pursuant to Article 247 of the Pakistan Constitution, these officials are responsible for governing and providing judicial services.
ref: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.

src: 當地時間今天早上 10 點，伊斯蘭聖城麥加有一處旅館倒塌。
mt: At 10am local time this morning, a hotel in Mecca, the Islamic holy city of Mecca, collapsed.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time.

src: 這座建築物留宿了一些在麥加朝覲前夕造訪聖城的朝聖者們。
mt: This building has accommodated some pilgrims visiting the holy city on the eve of Mecca's pilgrimage.
ref: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.

src: 該青年旅館的房客主要為阿拉伯聯合大公國人民。
mt: The main tenants of this hostel are the people of the United Arab Emirates.
ref: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.

src: 至少 15 人死亡，預期這個數字會繼續上升。
mt: At least 15 people have died, and this number is expected to continue to rise.
ref: The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: 雷歐諾夫，又名「11 號太空人」，是蘇聯最早的太空飛行員團隊成員。
mt: Leonov, also known as the "11th astronaut", was one of the earliest team members of Soviet space pilots.
ref: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts.

src: 1965 年 3 月 18 日，他執行首次太空載具外活動 (EVA) ，或稱「太空漫步」，獨自待在太空船外剛好超過 12 分鐘。
mt: On March 18, 1965, he performed his first Extravehicular Activity (EVA), or Spacewalk, where he spent more than 12 minutes alone outside the spacecraft.
ref: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.

src: 他因此成就得到蘇聯最高榮譽「蘇聯英雄」的稱號。
